Package edu.wm.cs.cs301.game2048

Interface GameState

All Known Implementing Classes:
State
public interface GameState

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addTile()
    Randomly selects a tile on the board that currently carries a value of 0 and sets it to a randomly selected value of either 2 or 4.
    boolean canMerge()
    Tells if there is at least one row or column with a pair of tiles that carry the same value and could be merged by one of the four move operations (left, right, up, down).
    int down()
    Moving all tiles as much down as possible and merging tiles according to the rules of 2048.
    int getValue​(int x, int y)
    Gets the value of the tile on the board at the given position.
    boolean isFull()
    Tells if all tiles on the board have a value greater than 0.
    int left()
    Moving all tiles as much to the left as possible and merging tiles according to the rules of 2048.
    boolean reachedThreshold()
    Tells if the highest value of a tile reached the threshold to win the game, i.e., if the max value is greater of equal 2048.
    int right()
    Moving all tiles as much to the right as possible and merging tiles according to the rules of 2048.
    void setEmptyBoard()
    Sets the values of all tiles on the board to 0.
    void setValue​(int x, int y, int value)
    Sets the value of the tile on the board at the given position.
    int up()
    Moving all tiles as much up as possible and merging tiles according to the rules of 2048.

  • Method Details

    • getValue

      int getValue​(int x, int y)
      Gets the value of the tile on the board at the given position. Index is zero based.
      Parameters:
      x - index, range 0,1,2,3
      y - index, range 0,1,2,3
      Returns:
      the value at the given (x,y) position

    • setValue

      void setValue​(int x, int y, int value)
      Sets the value of the tile on the board at the given position. Index is zero based.
      Parameters:
      x - index, range 0,1,2,3
      y - index, range 0,1,2,3
      value - for the tile, expected values are 0 and powers of 2

    • setEmptyBoard

      void setEmptyBoard()
      Sets the values of all tiles on the board to 0.

    • addTile

      boolean addTile()
      Randomly selects a tile on the board that currently carries a value of 0 and sets it to a randomly selected value of either 2 or 4.
      Returns:
      true if value setting worked, false otherwise

    • isFull

      boolean isFull()
      Tells if all tiles on the board have a value greater than 0.
      Returns:
      true if the board is full, false otherwise

    • canMerge

      boolean canMerge()
      Tells if there is at least one row or column with a pair of tiles that carry the same value and could be merged by one of the four move operations (left, right, up, down).
      Returns:
      true if a merge of tiles is possible, false otherwise

    • reachedThreshold

      boolean reachedThreshold()
      Tells if the highest value of a tile reached the threshold to win the game, i.e., if the max value is greater of equal 2048.
      Returns:
      true if the threshold is reached, false otherwise

    • left

      int left()
      Moving all tiles as much to the left as possible and merging tiles according to the rules of 2048. The method returns the sum of values of all tiles that merged.
      Returns:
      total extra points for the score from this move

    • right

      int right()
      Moving all tiles as much to the right as possible and merging tiles according to the rules of 2048. The method returns the sum of values of all tiles that merged.
      Returns:
      total extra points for the score from this move

    • down

      int down()
      Moving all tiles as much down as possible and merging tiles according to the rules of 2048. The method returns the sum of values of all tiles that merged.
      Returns:
      total extra points for the score from this move

    • up

      int up()
      Moving all tiles as much up as possible and merging tiles according to the rules of 2048. The method returns the sum of values of all tiles that merged.
      Returns:
      total extra points for the score from this move
